definition[0]: an object, sign etc that shows the position of something
example[0]: He buried the bodies in a single grave with a wooden cross as a marker.
definition[1]: something which shows that a quality or feature exists or is present
example[1]: antibodies which are a marker of hepatitis
example[2]: the use of slang as a marker of social identity
definition[2]: a large pen with a thick point made of felt, used for marking or drawing things
